title: Computer Science Engineer
about-me: As a seasoned Computer Science Engineer with over 15 years of expertise in the software development industry, I specialize in .NET development. Having successfully completed 20+ projects, my focus spans ERP systems and cutting-edge technologies, particularly in electronic payment transactions and value-added services at points of sale, all executed within the .NET framework. My versatile roles, ranging from Analyst Programmer to Solutions Architect, showcase my comprehensive experience in all facets of .NET software development. I've effectively led teams and contributed to academia as a thesis tutor, enriching emerging professionals within the .NET ecosystem. Proficient in both agile (Scrum, Kanban) and traditional methodologies, I've excelled in managing .NET projects. My international exposure has honed adaptability, allowing me to seamlessly navigate cross-border .NET projects. From initial client interactions to post-implementation support, I offer holistic insights, providing tailored .NET solutions aligned with organizational goals. Eager to contribute my .NET skills and experience to your team and drive success.

work-experience.roleDescription: .NET Backend Developer specializing in application business logic.
responsabilities: Proficient in creating API and web services using ASP.NET Core
Experienced in database management, security, and performance optimization
Skilled in testing, quality assurance, and problem-solving

responsabilities: Developed detailed plans with objectives, deadlines, and necessary resources for successful project execution

Development of detailed plans with project objectives, deadlines, and necessary resources
Migration of applications between development and production environments
Definition and implementation of tasks and components for the SDLC
Analysis, design, and implementation of new requirements
Full-stack developer
Support level 3
